div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 221 Eretria (Isis temple), Euboea, 1914 (401) Burial: 198 B.C. (Newell); 194 (Wallace) Contents: 352 AE. Pot hoard from excava- tions Boeotia: 1 Chalcis: 47 Euboean League: 40 Eretria: 225 (all Mantidoros) Unc.: 39 Disposition: Athens Papadakis, A Delt 1915, pp. 120, 145-7 Newell, NNM 68 (1935), pp. 11-23 Wallace, NNM 134 (1956), pp. 119 ff. The AR triob. of Euboea included by Noe was found on the cover of the pot and may not belong to the hd.
